name: Fenasi
description:
Fenasi the last farmer.

Trying to harvest as much as possible before his inevitable end!

Find Fenasi's farming tools and water, plant, harvest whilst trying to survive!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD : to move
  • E : to pickup / use
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON : to attack

This is a POST JAM version of a submission made for Ludum Dare 52. 

Theme was "Harvest" 

You can play the version submitted for the jam at ldjam.com
